document_notes.text:
This update for xmlbeans fixes the following issues:

  - CVE-2021-23926: Fixed XML parsers not protecting from malicious XML input (bsc#1180915).
document_notes.title: Details

relationship.relates_to_product_reference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise Workstation Extension 12 SP5

notes.text: The XML parsers used by XMLBeans up to version 2.6.0 did not set the properties needed to protect the user from malicious XML input. Vulnerabilities include possibilities for XML Entity Expansion attacks. Affects XMLBeans up to and including v2.6.0.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

product_id: SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12 SP5:xmlbeans-2.6.0-3.3.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Workstation Extension 12 SP5:xmlbeans-2.6.0-3.3.1

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
